title: The Gardener and Other Short Stories
description: A Postman is reading people's letters; things keep going missing in the town of Vanishing; and what could possibly go wrong when a kind man offers to do the gardening for his elderly neighbour? Welcome to The Gardener and Other Short Stories, an illustrated collection of surreal tales served dark, funny and unexpected. Featuring over thirty illustrations from the talented Anna Ametller, this collection of short stories lead us through a world of strange villages, suspicious people and delicious twists. Exciting, stylish and very satisfying, it's a perfect book for those who like stories and surprise.
author: Luke L. Carter
